name: Little Deviants
summary: Join the Little Deviants in a series of madcap adventures that allow you to have fun discovering and experimenting with the new PS Vita System functions - including rear touch, front touch, six-axis motion senors, front and rear cameras and microphone.

esrb.synopsis: This is a collection of mini-games in which players gather blob-like characters (i.e., Deviants) that have crash-landed on an alien world. As players complete various activities (rolling Deviants through maze-like landscapes; navigating hot air balloons), they sometimes battle against “cartoony” creatures. In one mini-game, players use a crosshair target to fire colorful projectiles at robots flying across the screen; enemies emit “dizzy stars” when stunned, and disappear amid small explosions when defeated. In another mini-game, players must avoid zombies that emit burping/vomiting sounds—green or purple gas clouds are depicted. One level depicts a train speckled with red blood-like splotches; another sequence depicts zombies holding weapons (e.g., chainsaws, hammers) stained with faded green liquid.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 7 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards fantasy characters - Violence that is set in a cartoon, slapstick or child like setting that could be upsetting to very young children - Pictures or sounds likely to be scary to young children
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE
